raw_text: Mrs M – AMARASEKERA – Beloved wife of late Mr H. Amarasekera,​ loving Mother of Sarath Amarasekera (People’s Bank) Late Pushpa Amarasekera,​ Dr Stanley Amarasekera (Consultant Cardiologist) Sunil Amarasekera and Dinesh Amarasekera,​ Mother in law of Manel,​ Dr Chandrika (Consultant Chemical Pathologist),​ Jinendrika (Manju) and Tharanga,​ Grandmother of Dr Sachini (LRH Colombo) Dr Kulitha (Elpitiya),​ Dr Uvini (Peradeniya),​ Ashan (IT Consultant),​ Dr Virantha (Registrar Orthopedic Surgery),​ Kulani (Senior Lecturer UOC),​ Dinuka,​ Piyumi (HSBC),​ Isuru (Qatar),​ Neranjana (Pan Asia Bank),​ Kenula,​ passed away on 8th December 2023,​ Funeral is at Residence,​ No. 11,​ Kaludewala,​ Circular Road,​ Matale on 8th and 9th December,​ Cortege leaves residence at 3 p.m. on 9th December,​ Cremation at 4 p.m. at Public Cemetery,​ Matale.081567

Mr R.G.L. de SILVA – It is with deep sadness we announce the peaceful passing away of our beloved father Mr R.G.L. de Silva,​ Senior Attorney-at-Law,​ husband of the late Malini de Silva,​ father of Nilu Senadeera,​ Kaushalya Hatch,​ Siromi Wijesinghe and Shanaka de Silva and father-in-law of Nigel Hatch PC,​ Ravi Wijesinghe (USA),​ Inoka de Silva (Canada). Cortege leaves residence at 16 A,​ Don Carolis Road,​ Colombo 5 on 10.12.2023 at 3.15 p.m. for Cremation at General Cemetery Kanatte.081631
